questions.question: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.

answers.answer: Thanks for your invitation, it is very kind. I will come with pleisure!
But how can I help you?
I can bring some food and I also come early to install everything with you. My father have good taste for music and he can put some songs on a USB key if you want.
Have a good day and I am sure your birhtday will be the best!
